Name: 窓の中の先にあるもの
About the game: This game is a puzzle game in which you switch between two perspectives, one viewed from the side and the other viewed from above, aiming for the goal window. The biggest feature is that when you change the viewpoint, the depth and height also change. Please enjoy the mysterious feeling that 'the brain is buggy'. It is a puzzle game that switches between the viewpoint from the side and the viewpoint from above. Seen from the side, the stacked wooden boxes feel heavy and cannot be moved, but ... Seen from above, it feels only the weight of one wooden box, so it can be moved. Seen from above, the blocks and stairs are separated, but ... It doesn't look like it's far away from the side, so you can ride on the block. Seen from the side, you can't get on the stacked wooden boxes, but ... When viewed from above, there is no difference in height between the block and the wooden box, so you can ride on the wooden box.
